item.title: Melinda add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "You do not have to be good. You do not have to walk on your knees for a hundred miles through the desert, repenting. You only have to let the soft animal of your body love what it loves. Tell me about despair, yours, and I will tell you mine. Meanwhile the world goes on. Meanwhile the sun and the clear pebbles of the rain are moving across the landscapes, over the prairies and the deep trees, the mountains and the rivers. Meanwhile the wild geese, high in the clean blue air, are heading home again. Whoever you are, no matter how lonely, the world offers itself to your imagination, calls to you like the wild geese, harsh and exciting â€“ over and over announcing your place in the family of things." -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Melinda add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melinda add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Youth can not know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melinda add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Holey? You have the the whole world of ear-related humor before you, you go for holey?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melinda add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Cinderella? Snow White? What's that? An illness?" -- J.K. Rowling
